current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize per
		  diem payments under comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans to
		  furnish care to dependents of homeless veterans, and for other
		  purposes.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Creating a Reliable Environment for
			 Veterans' Dependents Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 paragraph:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 2012(a) of
			 title 38, United States Code

header.#text:
Authorization of per
			 diem payments for furnishing care to dependents of certain homeless
			 veterans

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
) may
				receive per diem payments under this subsection may include furnishing care for
				a dependent of a homeless veteran who is under the care of such homeless
				veteran while such homeless veteran receives services from the grant recipient
				(or
				entity).

text.#text:
Services for which a recipient of a grant
				under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1058 IS: Creating a Reliable Environment for Veterans' Dependents Act
